item.title: Company Embarks on Robust Overseas Market Strategy
item.description: After firmly establishing a leading position in Chinaâ€™s new-energy power-battery market, the company is officially sounding the horn for its global expansion. Backed by strong technological prowess, outstanding product quality, and large-scale manufacturing advantages, we are poised to bring safe, efficient, and reliable lithium solutions to a broader international stage and take an active role in the worldwide transition to green energy.
